page.title: 05Four Oaks Health
page.content: The National Health service allied with the social welfare provisions is the basic source of the wellbeing of the district. The number of doctors in practice is above the national average due in some measure to the articulate way in which most people express themselves when talking to doctors. Hospital care is nearby at Sutton Coldfield, Birmingham and Lichfield. There are normally no admission problems except waiting lists associated with some medical condition,a trend, recently, has been the number of people who are members of the private medical insurance schemes. This is sometimes a 'Perk' related to employment, this increase in membership of private schemes has received a recent boost by the opening of a privately financed hospital at Little Aston.
